title: Calories in KFC Chicken Tenders
meta_description: Discover calories in chicken tenders KFC for a 3-piece serving, including protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and quick tweaks for your meal.
assumptions: Breaded, fried KFC chicken tenders; standard 3-piece serving (~120 g total); no dipping sauce or sides included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and frying method. Check KFC app or packaging for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A 3-piece serving of KFC chicken tenders provides ~300 kcal and 28 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with KFC's provided data.

tweaks.label: Add 1 packet of KFC honey mustard sauce
Add 1 packet of KFC BBQ sauce

faqs.q: How many calories in one KFC chicken tender?
What is the protein in KFC chicken tenders?
Are KFC chicken tenders high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, ~1240 mg sodium in 3 tenders due to breading and seasoning.

faqs.q: How many carbs in chicken tenders KFC?
faqs.a: Around 23 g carbs in a 3-piece serving, mostly from breading.

faqs.q: Do KFC chicken tenders have trans fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat per serving.
